description: The Democratic Republic of Congo and Rwanda-backed armed group M23 negotiated the deal in Qatar. It follows a separate agreement between the DRC and Rwanda.

headline: Secondhand medals reveal existence of Russian intelligence cyber units
description: A new report has analyzed public images of medals from the 16th Center of the Federal Security Service (FSB), Russia's internal intelligence branch responsible for communications espionage, uncovering valuable information about its organization.

headline: Avignon staging of Pelicot trial brings theater of the real to a new height
description: In 'Le Procès Pelicot,' Swiss director Milo Rau brought four months of the landmark Pelicot mass rape trial to the stage on Friday, July 18, with unflinching rigor and an avoidance of sensationalism.

headline: Pier Paolo Pasolini's mysterious death continues to haunt Italy, 50 years on
description: The murder of the Italian writer and filmmaker on November 2, 1975, still raises many questions. Among those who have not given up on the case, lawyer Stefano Maccioni fought for years to have judicial proceedings reopened. Now, he places his hopes in the parliamentary inquiry committee that has just been created.

description: 'The Summer of 1945' (5/6). In the aftermath of the war, the Vichy city council sought to restore the town's status as the 'capital of thermal spas.' At the same time, secular groups and religious institutions worked to offer children a summer break before the new school year began.

headline: Russia is facing a labor shortage
description: The Russian economy is set to need 10 million workers by 2030 – a challenge made more daunting as the country's demographic decline accelerates, worsened by the human losses from the war in Ukraine.

headline: 'I regretted that road trip, which no doubt ended our relationship': How travel can strengthen or break bonds
description: For young couples or friends, the first vacation together often acts as a test. From deepened connections to breakups at highway rest stops, here are some stories about the delicate art of sharing an adventure.
